content:
I'm currently ignoring /.lake/ in my Mathlib/Lean project's .gitignore file.

Does this align with the recommended practices for files that should not be tracked in Mathlib/Lean projects?

From what I understand, lake-manifest.json and lean-toolchain are usually not excluded, thereby locking the project to specific versions of its dependencies, correct?

Yes, you can check Mathlib's .gitignore for example:
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/master/.gitignore
Isak Colboubrani has marked this topic as resolved.
